title: UPSAT! Impossible Reflex Game v3.0
description:
UPSAT is a fast paced indie action puzzle game where you race against an ever quickening timer while trying to complete as many ridiculous mini games as possible before you just can't keep up anymore. Push your reflexes to their limit as you tap, swipe, and shake your way through over 20 mini games!

We use the tongue-in-cheek title Ã¢â‚¬Å“You Probably Suck At ThisÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ because of the games insulting humor that will taunt you for every mistake you make and dare you to try again when you inevitably fail. 

Similar to WarioWare, each mini game is extremely simple once you figure them out, but the real challenge will come as the game gets faster and you find yourself trying to Ã¢â‚¬Å“Slap the MonkeyÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ and then Ã¢â‚¬Å“Shake them HipsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ all within a matter of seconds!

Full Version Includes:

** Basic Survival and Hardcore Modes
** Over 20 Mini-Games With Many More To Come
** Post Your High Scores To Facebook and Twitter
** Scoreloop Support For Competing With Your Friends
** 25 Silly And Challenging Achievements
** Native Support For Multiple Languages

What's in this version:

UPSAT VERSION 3.0 IS HERE!
- Scoreloop Integration
- Post to Facebook and Twitter from in Game
- Various bug fixes and performance improvements
- Openfeint removed
